title: Market capitalization of leading 100 banks worldwide 2016 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Market capitalization in trillion Euros in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '17 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '16.
The difference of Market capitalization in trillion Euros between the highest and lowest Quarter is 1.5.
min_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Market capitalization in trillion Euros in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '17 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '16.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Market capitalization in trillion Euros in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '17 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '16.

max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Market capitalization in trillion Euros in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '17 has the highest Market capitalization in trillion Euros and Q2 '16 has the lowest Market capitalization in trillion Euros.
There is a difference of 1.5 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '17 and minimum Quarter Q2 '16.
Market capitalization in trillion Euros at Quarter Q4 '17 is 5.6 , second place is  at 5.3, and thirdly is Q1 '17 at 5.4.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros has reduced over the past 15 Quarters.
Quarter Q2 '19, Q1 '19, Q2 '18, and Q4 '16 have a similar Market capitalization in trillion Euros that is 5.2.
The lowest value 4.1 at Q2 '16 is almost 1.11 times smaller than the average value 5.07.
